headline: Pfizer (PFE) Receives CHMP Recommendation For Adapted COVID-19 Vaccine COMIRNATY
summary: BioNTech SE and Pfizer (PFE) recently received a positive recommendation from the European Medicines Agency for marketing authorization of their COVID-19 vaccine, which likely contributed to Pfizer's share price increase of 8% in the last quarter. The company's advancements in COVID-19 vaccine development, alongside other product-related announcements like the XTANDI and BRAFTOVI trial results, added weight to this upward movement. Despite legal challenges and declining earnings, Pfizer's...

headline: Keep Calm And Keep Buying These Dividends
summary: Discover why giving up on dividend investing could be a costly mistake & explore top dividend investments to buy now for steady income & long-term growth. Read more here.
